fields.headline: Dressing up, dressing down
fields.bodyText: Dressing up Chemical brothers Our all-time top dance act is playing London's Olympia on 30 August - the first time any band has played the historic venue in a decade. And that's all our weekend fun taken care of Whistles Ex Topshop supremo and style guru Jane Shepherdson takes over the high-street favourite. Expect brilliant things from the store this autumn. We'll be first in line The wackiness Nineties New York nostalgia film. Starring the superb Ben Kingsley and featuring a great soundtrack. There's also cameo by Mary-Kate Olsen. Need we say more? Dressing down Flat shoes In the evenings they make us feel a tad too stumpy and girly. We're working on it, though. Because we love Alexander McQueen's grey flats. Maybe we'll have it cracked it by Christmas Olympics on TV Great sport and competition and everything, but watching all that patriotic athletic prowess while we loll on the sofa makes us feel horribly guilty Festival fatigue Who thought you could have too much of a good thing? Keep with it - you've only got to chug cider and sweat in a tent a few more times this year. And Bestival is sure to be brilliant...
